content: . There was a trend toward reduced mortality in amiodarone-treated patients with nonischemic cardiomyopathy in CHF-STAT. The possibility that amiodarone might reduce mortality in nonischemic cardiomyopathy remained open.
query: amiodarone beta-blockers mortality death cardiovascular outcomes hazard ratio odds ratio
title: Prescribing Amiodarone: An Evidence-Based Review of Clinical Indications
reference: Vassallo, P., & Trohman, R. G. (2007). Prescribing amiodarone: An evidence-based review of clinical indications. JAMA, 298(11), 1312-1322. https://doi.org/10.1001/jama.298.11.1312
